response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a symbol of innovation, craftsmanship, and a testament to years of dedication. I believe its true worth surpasses $1,000,000, but I am willing to consider your perspective on its value. To kickstart our discussion, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your interests and budget, or if you would like to propose a counteroffer. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 950000}
